TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TextDecoration extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
Public NotInheritable Class TextDecoration Inherits Animatable

summary.span: 表示文字裝飾，即加入文字的視覺裝飾 (如底線)。

span.span: Represents a text decoration, which a visual ornamentation that is added to text (such as an underline).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字裝飾的四種類型： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 下列範例顯示相對於文字的文字裝飾的位置。The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文字裝飾類型的範例Example of text decoration types 下列範例示範設定線性漸層筆刷與虛線的畫筆樣式的文字裝飾。The following example shows a text decoration that has been styled with a linear gradient brush and a dashed pen. ![線性漸層底線的文字裝飾](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "以線性漸層底線的文字裝飾")![Text decoration with linear gradient underline](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "Text decoration with linear gradient underline") 範例中的底線樣式以線性漸層筆刷和虛線的畫筆Example of an underline styled with a linear gradient brush and dashed pen 請注意，衍生自。Notice that is derived from . 這樣做可將動畫的效果套用到裝飾項目，使用如和如。This makes it possible to apply animated effects to the decoration elements, using a for the and a for the .

public: TextDecoration(System::Windows::TextDecorationLocation location, System::Windows::Media::Pen ^ pen, double penOffset, System::Windows::TextDecorationUnit penOffsetUnit, System::Windows::TextDecorationUnit penThicknessUnit);

span.span: The location of the text decoration.

param.name: pen

span.span: The used to draw the text decoration.

param.span: 如果這個值為 ，則文字裝飾顏色與套用到的文字顏色相符，且文字裝飾的粗細會設定為字型的建議粗細。

span.span: If this value is , the text decoration color matches the text color to which it is applied, and the text decoration's thickness is set to the font's recommended thickness.

param.name: penOffset
param.span: 文字裝飾位置的垂直替代。

span.span: The vertical displacement from the text decoration's location.

param.span: 負值會向下移動裝飾，而正值會向上移動裝飾。

span.span: A negative value moves the decoration lower, while a positive value moves the decoration higher.

param.name: penOffsetUnit
param.span: 用於解譯 penOffset 值的單位。

span.span: The units used to interpret the value of penOffset.

param.name: penThicknessUnit
param.span: 用於解譯 pen 之 值的單位。

span.span: The units used to interpret the value of the for the pen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例顯示相對於文字的文字裝飾的位置。The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text. ![文字裝飾位置的圖表](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文字裝飾位置的圖表")![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") 文字裝飾類型的範例Example of text decoration types 屬性可讓您從指定的文字裝飾的位移。The property enables you to offset the text decoration from the specified . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，刪除線文字裝飾會建立使用畫筆的單色筆刷。In the following code example, a strikethrough text decoration is created with a solid color brush for the pen. 屬性設定為 。The property is set to . summary.span: 取得或設定用於繪製文字裝飾的 。

The used to draw the text decoration.

value.span: 如果此值為null，裝飾色彩比對要套用的文字裝飾的粗細設字型的建議寬度。

span.span: If this value is null, the decoration color matches the text to which it is applied and the decoration's thickness is set to the font's recommended thickness.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例示範設定線性漸層筆刷與虛線的畫筆樣式的文字裝飾。The following example shows a text decoration that has been styled with a linear gradient brush and a dashed pen. ![線性漸層底線的文字裝飾](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "以線性漸層底線的文字裝飾")![Text decoration with linear gradient underline](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "Text decoration with linear gradient underline") 範例中的底線樣式以線性漸層筆刷和虛線的畫筆Example of an underline styled with a linear gradient brush and dashed pen ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 在下列程式碼範例中，底線文字裝飾會建立與虛線畫筆線性漸層筆刷。In the following code example, an underline text decoration is created with a linear gradient brush for the dashed pen. MemberSignature.Value: public: property double PenOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定文字裝飾距其 的位移 (Offset)。

span.span: Gets or sets the text decoration's offset from its .

value.span: 文字裝飾距其 的位移。

span.span: The text decoration's offset from its .
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正值會將移動的文字裝飾時，負值會將較高，文字裝飾。A negative value moves the text decoration higher, while a positive value moves the text decoration lower. 使用屬性來指定如何解譯此值的單位。Use the property to specify how the units of this value are interpreted. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following code example shows how to set the property.
